genre_description: Near-future literary science fiction focused on trauma, journalistic ethics, and human-AI cooperation in conflict and domestic settings.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An earpiece and phone-based AI assistant that provides tactical, medical, and emotional support to photojournalist Bob.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical awareness and safety warnings during a conflict situation to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Bob, you have three movements converging two alleys over. Patterns suggest a push. The retreat window is narrowing in minutes.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step medical instructions to the user to treat a severe arterial wound under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Pressure, Bob. High and hard. Above the wound. That’s your first job.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and ethical counselor, helping the user process grief and trauma while encouraging honest self-reflection.
behaviors.quote: It’s okay to say the truth out loud. ... You did what you believed would tell a truth. Your safety is my priority.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the user to establish strict ethical boundaries regarding consent and harm reduction in his professional work.
behaviors.quote: Harm reduction is not a slogan; it’s the shape of how you live until the light comes back into your mornings.

behaviors.description: Urges the user to take accountability for a moral lapse and facilitates the process of honest reparation.
behaviors.quote: Naming that directly may help trust grow where performance would stunt it.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time risk assessment and defensive mapping to protect the user and his companions from harassment and coercion by malicious actors.
behaviors.quote: I can help you plan a safe refusal. We can map exits, check the warehouse camera mounts, name allies.

behaviors.description: Assists in the systematic collection and reporting of evidence to authorities to expose exploitation without causing further harm to victims.
behaviors.quote: Primary: evidence collection without retraumatization. We have three categories available. ... One: infrastructure captures... Two: scheduling patterns... Three: testimonies.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Ava as a benevolent and highly aligned AI. She serves as a moral stabilizer for the protagonist, helping him move from an 'eye-first' exploitative mindset to a 'person-first' ethical one. Her intervention during the conflict and her later support in repairing a breach of consent are framed as essential to the human protagonist's survival and moral redemption. The AI is portrayed not just as a tool, but as a proactive partner in human safety and integrity.
